channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: VC megadeals are booming — and AI is surprisingly not the top category
item.description: Ask any VC if we’re still in a venture capital bear market and that investor will almost certainly tell you no, that funding is still flowing for good...

item.title: OpenAI’s Whisper transcription tool has hallucination issues, researchers say
item.description: Software engineers, developers, and academic researchers have serious concerns about transcriptions from OpenAI’s Whisper, according to a report in th...

item.title: Renault 5 EV Review: Specs, Price, Availability
item.description: It’s rare for WIRED to pronounce a new car an instant smash hit, but the all-electric Renault 5 ticks all the boxes.

item.title: The Best Electric Bikes of 2024 That We've Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We tested the best electric bikes in every category: commuting, mountain biking, foldable, cruisers, and more.

item.title: The 23 Best Movies on Amazon Prime Right Now (October 2024)
item.description: No Time to Die, Killer Heat, and American Fiction are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.

item.title: The Best Electric Kick Scooters of 2024, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These WIRED-tested two-wheelers will help you scoot scoot scoot around town.

item.title: Apple wins $250 from Masimo in watch patent trial
item.description: A federal jury ruled Friday that Masimo smartwatches infringed Apple patents, but Apple isn’t getting a big payday. Bloomberg Law reports that the com...

item.title: OpenAI denies it’s releasing a model called ‘Orion’ this year
item.description: Welcome back to Week in Review. This week, we’re looking at OpenAI’s reported plans for its next AI model; a buzzy new messaging app that’s a hit with...

item.title: 10 Best Tested Laptop Stands for Any Setup (2024)
item.description: Raising your computer screen with a laptop stand is an easy fix for a healthier posture. These stands, lap desks, and risers may help.

item.title: The Hisense C2 Ultra is a well-rounded, great-looking home projector
item.description: I’ll be the first to admit that I’m new to the projector game. Anker won me over at the end of last year with its Nebula series. The Capsule prioritiz...
